mapper.insert: insert into reply values( reply_number, #{reply_content}, now(), #{reply_score}, #{member_email}, #{lesson_number} )
mapper.select:
select s1.*, at1.member_nickname as member_nickname, at1.member_photo as member_photo from ( select r.*, row_number() over (order by r.reply_number) from reply r ) s1 left join member at1 on s1.member_email = at1.member_email
where lesson_number = #{lesson_number}
select count(*) from reply where lesson_number = #{lesson_number} and member_email = #{member_email};
select count(*) from payment where lesson_number = #{lesson_number} and member_email = #{member_email} and payment_state = 1;
